attributes.action: Urge the government to set an end date for the Bond market
attributes.additional_details:
As we know in any language of economics be it barter , monetry or a sophisiticated form of digital barter not using money.
Y!ou don't want to owe some guy 30 Cows for too long.

When the economy is black it's fresh and poised when it's so in the red as this country those Cows are long dead putting this country on borrowed time.

I'm proud to be Britsh I know that the ARM Arcitecture & Dirac Video Codec, Jet engines , Graphene and all the Very mature for this world's industrial mantality type of thinking and ability is worth something right now far more than some !thing like banking in the red

So lets set a date to scrap the current Bond driven system and phase out bonds for something bettter leading the way yet again on a balanced budget as we once did when we ruled just this time making money using more modern industrial assistance where britian could actually help and earn her way.

.What .Black .Could .Replace the Bond market
